body_html: The flip-side of this, is that if people don't see these warning, they may end up filing performance bugs. The proper way to fix them is to use TensorFlow build that uses your architecture. I get 3x speed-up on large matrix multiply when using architecture-specific TF build -- #7257 (comment)
body_text: The flip-side of this, is that if people don't see these warning, they may end up filing performance bugs. The proper way to fix them is to use TensorFlow build that uses your architecture. I get 3x speed-up on large matrix multiply when using architecture-specific TF build -- #7257 (comment)
body: The flip-side of this, is that if people don't see these warning, they may end up filing performance bugs. The proper way to fix them is to use TensorFlow build that uses your architecture. I get 3x speed-up on large matrix multiply when using architecture-specific TF build -- https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7257#issuecomment-277456370
